entry.title: Jamming call May 15th
entry.summary: Hello everyone,Next week, there will be a jamming call on Monday, May 15 at 5 pm UTC. The link to join the meeting is available at https://meet.jit.si/UnjammingLN. The purpose of this meeting is to discuss HTLC endorsement and local reputation. The draft spec PR has been updated with some details on how reputation tracking should look like, and the organizers would like to get some early feedback. Agenda items can also be added by any participant. The links to the updated draft spec PR and the agenda items can be found at https://github.com/lightning/bolts/pull/1071 and https://github.com/ClaraShk/LNJamming/issues/14 respectively. Join Carla, Clara, and others in this meeting to discuss important topics related to HTLC endorsement and local reputation in Lightning Network. See you there!
